_comment: This file is only for local development purposes and does not get deployed when you deploy this project in Azure Function Environment. Use it only if you want to test locally

Values.SourceCosmosDB: <Your connection string to your Monitored Container database account here>
Values.TargetCosmosDB: <Your connection string to your Target Container databse account here>
Values.PoisonQueueName: <name of the Queue to store poison documents>
Values.PoisonQueueConnectionString: <Azure Storage Connection String to hold the poison documents Queue>
